item.title: Restrict SSH
item.description: restrict_ssh.sh is a bash script which restricts ssh for a user to a set of commands via .ssh/authorized_keys, and log it verbosely.

item.title: SSH: Key and user restrictions
item.description: This tutorial will help you set restrictions for specific ssh keys and users. For example, how to allow only tunneling and how to restrict port forwards.
